1c068522-533d-4449-ad90-ac4f96b68a82.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
1c068522-533d-4449-ad90-ac4f96b68a82.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

f72e1cd4-2c0a-4d16-9a9a-34c605c8639e.name: Directional
f72e1cd4-2c0a-4d16-9a9a-34c605c8639e.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

4e9e3856-6a80-4fbf-9606-ff28b36b575f.name: Tough Skin
4e9e3856-6a80-4fbf-9606-ff28b36b575f.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

840da6a7-b72c-4662-907a-672f03e74323.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

a2667a39-51b3-436d-acd1-8653d176d02b.name: Oxygen Storage
a2667a39-51b3-436d-acd1-8653d176d02b.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

038fbad9-69bf-4598-a283-7f651d4078b5.name: Oxygen Storage
038fbad9-69bf-4598-a283-7f651d4078b5.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

122e4a4c-375b-44b1-8a3e-2b284f079577.name: Oxygen Storage
122e4a4c-375b-44b1-8a3e-2b284f079577.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

e5e741f6-c58c-45e6-b498-e40cd0e9aca0.name: Oxygen Storage
e5e741f6-c58c-45e6-b498-e40cd0e9aca0.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

00c958a1-fb8f-4197-996b-6dfe0c401d8f.name: Oxygen Storage
00c958a1-fb8f-4197-996b-6dfe0c401d8f.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

c5e57d41-5775-4618-9644-1f96f617cd8f.name: High Pain Threshold
c5e57d41-5775-4618-9644-1f96f617cd8f.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

7ce78b03-21a3-4c38-b495-7d83f8caa284.name: Diffuse
7ce78b03-21a3-4c38-b495-7d83f8caa284.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

57f2f09a-9e87-4d12-84a4-a839d96f4b82.name: Homogenous
57f2f09a-9e87-4d12-84a4-a839d96f4b82.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

ef834b14-ee70-4d9a-8662-57636615a0f6.name: No Blood
ef834b14-ee70-4d9a-8662-57636615a0f6.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

2f0bee70-0138-40d5-9b33-fc616d03f630.name: No Brain
2f0bee70-0138-40d5-9b33-fc616d03f630.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

77be83b1-16a8-4042-be66-0667f1b2b3a6.name: No Eyes
77be83b1-16a8-4042-be66-0667f1b2b3a6.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

258c3979-ba64-419a-8088-893cf0d979d7.name: No Head
258c3979-ba64-419a-8088-893cf0d979d7.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

3d3168ac-3030-48e0-aa53-b6bc53a44ac5.name: No Neck
3d3168ac-3030-48e0-aa53-b6bc53a44ac5.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

a25a0474-68d7-497a-aeca-14c975cb1628.name: No Vitals
a25a0474-68d7-497a-aeca-14c975cb1628.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

fbcfb8a6-b4b7-48ee-8fc9-cb2fb84ebd02.name: Unliving
fbcfb8a6-b4b7-48ee-8fc9-cb2fb84ebd02.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
